item.title: First Post
item.description: Hiya! It’s been little over half a year since I started learning programming and I wanted to start keeping records of what I’m doing, so I decided to creat this page. I’ve got nothing more to say really, I know it’s so random but I just finna leave my favorite theorem (Girsanov Theorem) here and end the first post, solely because I love math! Girsanov Theorem Let $(\phi_t)_{t\in [0,T]}$ be an adapted process satisfying the Novikov integrability condition $$ \mathbb{E}\bigg[\text{exp}\bigg( \frac{1}{2} \int^T_0 |\psi_t|^2 dt\bigg) \bigg] < \infty, $$ and let $\mathbb{Q}$ denote the probability measure defined by $$ \frac{d\mathbb{Q}}{d\mathbb{P}} = \text{exp}\bigg(-\int^T_0 \psi_s dB_s -\frac{1}{2}\int^T_0 |\psi_s|^2 ds \bigg) $$
